header_text: You just received recognition for a project you worked on. You’ve only received congratulations from a few people, and you thought you’d have more reactions by now. You wonder if people aren't congratulating you because they are busy.

elements.Text: Are people not congratulating you because they think you don't deserve it?

elements.name: You just received recognition for a project you worked on. You’ve only received congratulations from a few people, and you thought you’d have more reactions by now. You wonder if people aren't congratulating you because they are busy._Mental Health_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
